title: Hello World
description: My first blog post using Contentlayer

body.raw:
# Hello World

This is my first blog post using Contentlayer and MDX.

## Code Example

```typescript
function hello() {
  console.log("Hello, World!");
}
```

## Features

- MDX Support
- Syntax Highlighting
- Auto-linking Headers
- Dark Mode Support
